name: vscode-alias-jump
description: Jump to definition using path aliases

alias-jump.mappings.description: Path mappings for aliases. Key is the alias, value is the target path relative to project root (must start with /).

alias-jump.allowedSuffix.description: List of file extensions to try if the file path has no extension.

alias-jump.rootPath.description: Filename to identify the project root directory.

scripts.release: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add . && ver=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "chore: release v$ver" && git tag v$ver && git push --follow-tags && npm run package && npm run pb
